main.name: Nordic-Giant Project
main.description: I am a web development engineer and I use react and vue.js to develop pages. This project is a resume template that can be used as the project home page or resume page
main.bio: Use this bio section as your way of describing yourself and saying what you do, what technologies you like to use or feel most comfortable with, describing your personality, or whatever else you feel like throwing in.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: ALX School provided me with a holistic education that encompasses leadership development, entrepreneurship, soft skills, networking, personal growth, and problem-solving, with a focus on preparing me for successful careers and making a positive impact in Africa and beyond.

I gained proficiency in various programming languages, which serves as the foundation for developing software and applications. I also gained understanding on how to efficiently organize and manipulate data which is crucial for solving real-world problems and optimizing computer programs.

experience.title: Front end Developer Intern
experience.description: Led the creation of modern, responsive web applications through React.js and Next.js, ensuring pixel-perfect UI/UX design implementation. Applied SEO best practices for enhanced visibility and performance. Conducted code reviews, provided mentorship, and optimized the development workflow. Leveraged RESTful APIs and GraphQL for efficient data retrieval and display.

experience.title: Junior FrontEnd bug fixer
experience.description: Effectively addressed bugs in the HelpMeOut application while also expanding its capabilities by implementing additional functionalities and user interfaces.
